Line9.1086F0: Hmm, yes. This, uh, this corpse was treated with (smacks lips) Serpent Thorn and uh... (smacks lips) Oh yes. Blood Fungus.
MenuLabel: “Ugh… I didn’t pay attention to where I collected it from.”
VoiceDir7.1086F0: Irritated. Rolls eyes then snatches the item away from the Player. Zurke then tastes a piece of raw human flesh like it's not big deal.
VoiceDir9.1086F0: Thoughtful/Pondering. Pauses in between ingredient names as he remembers them
